metadata.title: 2 Year Asurion Toy Accident Protection Plan ($250-299.99)
features: Covers loss of diamond or gemstone due to a defect in the setting, scratches, prong re-tipping, broken chains, links, clasps, or bands and broken earring posts.
No deductibles or hidden fees. Shipping included on all repairs. Fully transferable.
Easy claims process online 24/7. If we can't fix it, we will send you an Amazon e-Card reimbursement for your product purchase price.
Plan term and coverage begins date of purchase and is inclusive of the manufacturer's warranty. Plan is fully refunded if canceled within 30 days.
Plan contract will be emailed from Asurion within 24 hours of purchase. This will not ship with your product.
description: Asurion is taking the guesswork out of finding product protection plans to fit your needs. Products fail - often at the most inconvenient time. It’s a good thing you’re covered because no other plan can protect your stuff the way an Asurion Protection Plan can. Simply put, Asurion Protection Plans cover your products when you need it most with a fast and easy claims process. Buy a protection plan from a company that you know and trust. Add an Asurion Protection Plan to your cart today! Please see "User Guide [pdf]" below for detailed terms and conditions related to this plan.
